attributes.action: Lower the Legal age of Responsibility to 7 years old.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There is too much anti-social behaviour by children under 10 and if they're old enough to know they can get away with it, they're old enough to know it's wrong. Punish the child AND prosecute the parents.  The UK has to take drastic action NOW.  The PC approach has failed and decent hardworking people are suffering.
